metadata.title: About Us | GoCoop
metadata.description: The page describes what the GoCoop website is all about and it's main goal to share info about cooperatives around the world.

aboutUs.sectionOne: Born in Brazil, GoCoop is a space dedicated to the power of cooperation. Here, cooperatives from around the world come together, organized by sector, to showcase their impact. More than just a directory, this is a place to connect, discover, and celebrate sustainable initiatives and the communities behind them â€”and we're just getting started. From Brazil, with love.
aboutUs.sectionTwo: In a world where collaboration makes a difference, the cooperatives emerge as an example of union and collective prosperity. Unlike traditional companies, cooperatives are organizations formed and run by people with a common goal, where each member has a voice and where all members share the benefits.
aboutUs.linksTitle: GoCoop is growing! Stay tuned as we work on new ways to connect and empower cooperatives worldwide.
